task.design_notification: The Front-End design has been motivated by Google Translate Community!
task.tr_desc: Allocate mongolian words corresponding to a given concept in multilingual forms
task.md_desc: Correct mistakes found in given mongolian words of a concept
task.vd_desc: Validate list of mongolian words that define its concept
task.loc_desc: Get introduced to primary stages of localizing ontology

domain.headline: Please localize concept sets in multilingual terms into Mongolian!
